rajyayaka palana thanthraya dharmika padanamak matha goda naga gatha yuthu aakaraya budunwahanse deshana kara atha.digha nikaye chakkhawaththi sihanada suthraya, kuta dantha suthraya, aggnynya suthraya aadi suthra deshana thula dharmika rajya palanaya pilibanda bauddha iganwim wigrahawe.kisiyam rajyayaka sthawarathwaya ho asthawarathwaya randa pawathinne palakayanage kriya kalapaya mathaya.rajuge dharmika kriya kalapaya rate saubhagya ya ha samrurdhiya pinisa hethuwe.aggnynya ha chakkhawaththi sihanada suthra anuwa rajaku lowa pahala wu aakarayath esema rajaku dahamin semin rata palanaya kala yuthu aakarayath pahadili kara di atha.rataka palamu purawasiya wana palakaya prathamayen dharmanukula wiya yuthu bawa budu dahama penwa deyi.”sabban rattan sukhan sethi – rajache hothi dhammiko”.raju dahami uwahoth siyaluma janaya suwase jiwath wanawa bawa meyin dakwe.
